thread.section_title: Oakfurnitureland Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Oakfurnitureland | oakfurnitureland.com
thread.title: Elizabeth

author: Elizabeth
title: Elizabeth
text: I chose the Galway style which is elegantly simple and blends well with my Craftsman style house. All items were true to size and fit perfectly in the room. They were fairly easy to assemble and all bolt holes lined up perfectly. I love the light oak finish. I ordered 3 wardrobes, a blanket chest and a chest of drawers for my dressing room. Again, all pieces matched each other which provides a unified appearance in the room.
